metadata.title: Satellite-Tracked Drifter Trajectories in the Bering Sea

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: Satellite-tracked drift buoys (~100) deployed in the Bering Sea.  Most bouys report latitude and longitude (i..e., bouy trajectories describing ocean currents).  A few drifters report sea temperature and ocean color.  Drogue depth 25 - 45 m.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Explore / measure  advection.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Weekly
